name: Looper (Hipposcripter)
description:
Delve into the laboratories of Sigma Labs, stop a mysterious catastrophic event, and fight dangerous anomalies.

Do everything in your power to save your timeline, send items into the next one, and explore a massive-interconnected environment

JAM PAGE

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/looper-3

Thanks to NB_Kenneth for his security captain character! NOTE! DO NOT HIT CONTINUE WITHOUT SAVE DATA, it will cause no items to spawn due to an unfixable bug
